website_summaries.verdict: Engineered for sophistication and perfected movements with each stroke and swing.
pros: Customers note the clubs' ability to generate easy drives as well as precision with each shot
Known for their ability to enhance one's course success and with better results than other models
Adapts easily for those at all levels
cons: Reports some irons may perform inconsistently

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Power. Don’t buy to fix swing
customer_reviews.text: If you’re bad, you’re going to still be bad after buying these. The forgiveness in the club face isn’t enough to correct a standard slice. If you’re not going to work on your club face and swing before buying these you’re wasting money. However!! A soft swing will crush the ball 100 yards easy. These clubs have a lot of power. The power comes from connecting clean with the ball though. So if you have a bad swing. These won’t fix it. 4 stars because they are expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Barnald Obamump

customer_reviews.title: Distance lost
customer_reviews.text: The review is still out. I have always played TaylorMade clubs and have always loved them, until now. I am seriously hoping that I am just having trouble getting used to the new clubs. I am losing about 15-20 yards per club from the M2’s that I had been playing. Will update this review if my distance returns. I have now played them several times and they are shorter. My A Wedge used to be my 100 yard club. I now get 85. My 7 iron was my 150 club. It is now 130. Am going to my fairway woods much more often.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Mattson

customer_reviews.title: love my new irons
customer_reviews.text: love my new irons. I had tailormade R7's prior. These clubs feel nicer on contact and go further. Seem to be forgiving as well
customer_reviews.author: Brooks Toso

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My golf game isn't worthy of these clubs, but I absolutely love them!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Scott G. Zeller

customer_reviews.title: Great clubs
customer_reviews.text: Amazing how the ball rockets off the club, even on miss hits. Stronger lofts definetly add to increased distance from every club but still very forgiving. Don't expect the shinny new clubs to stay that way for very long. I doesn't take long for the bottoms to dull due to the inner action with the turf. This doesn't change the playability at all. My set arrived without a 6 iron however Amazon went above and beyond to make sure I was taken care of in a professional and timely fashion.
customer_reviews.author: Bob S.

customer_reviews.title: Must haves!
customer_reviews.text: They say it's not the clubs, however, imagine yourself driving an M4 BMW and them saying it's not about the car! From the moment you pick them up the weight distribution instantly gives you the confidence to hit a pure shot consistently.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler M.

customer_reviews.title: Clubs were left handed!! Ugh
customer_reviews.text: Clubs are nice, but they are left handed. Item was clearly displayed on Amazon as right handed irons.
customer_reviews.author: james r cole

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It’s pretty good when my only concern is that I hit these clubs farther.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Beattie

customer_reviews.title: Great Upgrade
customer_reviews.text: Had 8 year old TM Burner 2.0s. Stock set up I strike these solid, great ball flight and am 15 yards longer. Combined with a better swing path these are good to go. I like them.
customer_reviews.author: Grenado DeLaCruz

customer_reviews.title: Worked great
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time - packaged great - very good, sticky type feel with long irons - can feel the face flex around ball - 4 handicapper happy with new sticks - PW is working great
customer_reviews.author: David Gleditsch

customer_reviews.title: 8-iron broke after two months.
customer_reviews.text: I rarely leave reviews. I like these irons but was disappointed when my 8-iron broke at the driving range after less than two months using them. I didn’t hit a rock or tree root. The adhesive that attached the iron and club face was insufficient. There is only a 30-day return policy for be careful.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew James

customer_reviews.title: excellent clubs.
customer_reviews.text: This is the first set of irons I have bought in over 20yrs, and I have to say I am impressed. Spent plenty of time at the range with them before hitting the course. First time on the course and I could see and feel a vast improvement to my game. Great club for me and will recommend to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Golf inprovement of distance
customer_reviews.text: I'was played golf by 10 years (HP 10). The M4 irons improve my distance and the feeling is very good. I was needed only a pair of practice rounds to adapt my swing
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Latino

customer_reviews.title: Happy Husband
customer_reviews.text: Bought as gift for my husband. He is beyond thrilled!
customer_reviews.author: Abatha

customer_reviews.title: Great Irons
customer_reviews.text: Irons delivered within delivery date and as per specifications. I tried them and they are excellent
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cant wait to try them.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set for my 17 year old son but unfortunately it is still too cold to golf which is why I only gave them 4 stars. The clubs arrived a day earlier than promised and as described.
customer_reviews.author: CEK

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for long hitters
customer_reviews.text: I have liked these clubs a lot used them about 30 times now. They are perfect, glad I bought them. Make sure you have lots of club speed to get the most out of these irons.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Clubs
customer_reviews.text: I love these irons. I have already noticed a vast improvement on shot accuracy. For the price I don't see another iron set out there that will perform as well as they do.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Gluski

customer_reviews.title: Solid striking of the balls
customer_reviews.text: Grips feel too small for my hands. When I hit with the clubs, the feel isn't great at the point of strike.
customer_reviews.author: frederick a. taylor  jr

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Received just what I ordered and I love the clubs. Great way to upgrade my irons without breaking the bank
customer_reviews.author: Tim Rogerson

customer_reviews.title: TaylorMade M4
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and weight of the clubs. I would highly recommend the M4 line to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: FRANK XSMITH II

customer_reviews.title: Solid set great deal as TM pushes out newer models
customer_reviews.text: Great clubs with good swing weight. If I am having a bad day it's all on me.
customer_reviews.author: Micheal S.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Good clubs. I hit them well the first time with them. I got a lot more distance and accuracy
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Weak attachment
customer_reviews.text: 5 iron head came off the shaft after 3 rounds Of golf.... the glue just gave out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are sweet!
customer_reviews.text: The irons are nicely responsive and provide an extra helping hand distance wise.
customer_reviews.author: Frederick W. Russell

customer_reviews.title: Bought 1 sert of Iron (4 to P)
customer_reviews.text: Excellent experience - quick delivery and good quality of product
customer_reviews.author: Guillaume

customer_reviews.title: Great clubs!
customer_reviews.text: Been playing TaylorMade for years. Upgraded to M4 this year and love em!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Turner

customer_reviews.title: Solid Clubs
customer_reviews.text: My first set of clubs after my beginner set. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brock Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Good for Pro players, not me!
customer_reviews.text: Club head forgiveness is very small, bounce is very hard, don't see extra distance, club head is scratched after only few shots.
customer_reviews.author: KBC

product_meta.title: TaylorMade M4 Iron Set
product_meta.description: Overview * TaylorMade's new M4 irons create a new generation of straight distance, consistency, and accuracy. * Their new RIBCOR design transfers more energy to the golf ball by stiffening the perimeter of the club and focusing flexibility where you make contact. * Heel and toe weighting are optimized to increase MOI and forgiveness by adding weight to perimeter of the club head. * M4 irons are ideal for golfers who not only want to hit the ball longer and straighter but do it more consistently. Features * New RIBCOR design stiffens the perimeter of club head, focusing face flexibility in the hitting area for distance and forgiveness with greater energy transfer to the golf ball * Optimized heel and toe weighting increase MOI for even more forgiveness * Speed Pocket structure and ultra-thin leading edge work together to increase speed on shots hit low on the face * Fluted hosel and 360A undercut cavity saves weight, redistributing it low in the head to increased launch distance and consistency RIBCORNew RIBCOR design localizes club face flexibility in the hitting area to transfer more energy to the ball for more distance and forgiveness. It also stiffens the perimeter of the club head for a more rigid club, enhancing sound and feel. RIBCOR creates a tighter dispersion by limiting the flexibility of the toe area.More Forgiving WeightingWeighting is optimized in the heel and toe of the club head to significantly increase MOI over the 2017 M2 irons.Speed Pocket + Face SlotsThe Speed Pocket and ultra-thin leading edge work together to increase speed on shots it low on the club face. Face slots are also included to protect ball speed.More DistanceA fluted hosel and 360A undercut cavity distributes mass low in the club head for greater launch, distance, and consistency.Unique Shaft OptionsMultiple shaft choices provide you with the personalized performance you need to make these irons work for your game.
feature_bullets: RIBCOR localizes face flexibility in the hitting area, transferring more energy to the ball to increase distance and accuracy.
RIBCOR stiffens the perimeter of the head creating a more rigid structure, enhancing sound and feel. RIBCOR mitigates toe flexibility for tighter dispersion.
Optimized heel & toe weighting provides an increase in MOI vs M2 17, resulting in more forgiveness. Ultra-thin leading edge works in conjunction w/the speed pocket to increase speed on low-face shots
More distance: fluted hostel and 360 Undercut allows for redistribution of mass low in the head to increase launch distance, and consistency
Aftermarket shafts: kbs max 85 and Fujikura atmos Red shafts are designed to deliver high launch and maximum ball speed

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
